Introduction
Krusmølle is a restaurant placed in the southern part of Denmark. We are a small restaurant with a café that can seat 30 guests

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are a restaurant placed in the

 

Introduction

Krusmølle is a restaurant placed in the southern part of Denmark. We are a small restaurant with a café that can seat 30 guests. Then we have 3 rooms for parties, in total we can serve around 200 guests during a day. 

We are not set on a certain style and we change the menu once every 3rd month + a few changes during that period. 

Our high season is Oktober - December where we serve around 300 lunches everyday. 
The rest of the year we only do parties, betweeen 5-6 every weekend. 

January we are closed down. 

Your tasks

We are looking for an assistant to the chef. 

Your responsebilities will be:

·         Prep all dishes

·         Self-regulation (state mandatory cleaning schedule etc.)

·         Maintain the kitchen

.         Daily cleaning of the kitchen area

Your profile

You will be given great freedom to work and the posibility to become selfsufficient.
We hope for a long term cooparation. 

You are / want:

·         A proffesional and can keep your cool when busy

·         To be given new challenges

.         A European citizen or have a Danish work permit

Benefits

We can offer

·         A young and energetic team

·         A lot of cool events during the year

·         The possibility of accomodation
